name: Efficient Frontier
summary: Efficient Frontier is a project initiated by SignalPlus and Bittensor, designed to identify the optimal risk-weighted trading strategies through the integration of decentralized machine learning networks and live trading data. This project will leverage Bittensor's innovative blockchain-powered AI learning protocol to advance our journey in discovering optimal crypto trading strategies. Furthermore, through the use of SignalPlus' market-leading platform, every day users will now be equipped with a professional trading toolkit that is available right on their desktop, enabling true democratised access and empowering the open-access initiative.
